about_the_game:
Dive into the synesthetic world of Amp, the neon rail shooter set in a polygonal rhythmic universe.

A NEON WORLD LIKE NO OTHER
Inspired by the world of audio, Amp takes your senses through the world where music is everything. Watch as you fly through pulsating environments to the beat

RHYTHMICALLY ENGAGE WITH THE FOES
Clear your path with different chain abilities to suit your play style

In this demo, you will explore the first level of the game, where we showcase the overall look & feel and core mechanics.
